entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
